mapper.insert: insert into adminator(admnum, admid, admpasswd) value(adminator_seq.nextval, #{userid}, #{passwd})

insert into commember(comnum, comid, compasswd, comname, comssn, comphone, comgrade, commemail, comaddr1, comaddr2, compost1, compost2) value(commember_seq.nextval, #{comid}, #{compasswd}, #{comname}, #{comssn}, #{comphone}, null, #{commemail}, #{comaddr1}, #{comaddr2}, #{compost1}, #{compost2} )

insert into entmember(entnum, entid, entpasswd, entname, entlocation, entphone, entcellphone, entfax, entin, enttype) value(entmember_seq.nextval, #{entid}, #{entpasswd}, #{entname}, #{entlocation}, #{entphone}, #{entcellphone}, #{entfax}, #{entin}, #{enttype})
